ovdesc.p: Define a scenario by portfolio. Record can be create manually or by rebalance routine. Allow to store data for simulation tool. This file contain three kind of block.
1 - Security pre-orders. Proposed buying or selling orders. Generate SEC.OPEN.ORDER records on validate (F5) with verify function.
2 - Forex. Store forex for simulation tools.
3 - Inflow or Outflow. Store inflow or outflow for simulation tools.
NOTES: Fields are named with "SC", "FX", "AC" depending of product plus "A" for active parts of transaction or "P" for passive parts of transaction.
